column5: Has anyone ever fished Uchi Lake? I have a trip planned for late June.Any tackle/tips would be greatly appreciated.
Check your email. If you have any question email me.

Couple of guys I know went there two years ago and they had a great time and caught plenty of fish. The only reason they didnt go back is they started fishing with our group and we have been going to another Resort for the last ten years and like it just fine. Good Luck and Be Safe.
Use to go there all the time. Caught my two largest walleye on that lake several years ago. Some great Northern action to. I use to backtroll orange floating jigs tipped with minnows.

Never been to Uchi, however we stay at Country Camping, which is run by the same group of folks. I can tell you that I have never had a bad experience with them, they're helpful and friendly. Please post a review when you get back!
What were you using for walleye and pike? What was your largest pike/walleye? Thanks
